SCTX:
Begin jeannechestScript

short greetonce

if ( GetJournalIndex EB_Bone < 20 )
	return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex EB_Bone >= 40 )
	return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex EB_Bone == 30 )
	return
endif

if ( greetonce == -1 )
	return
endif

if ( GetDistance Player <= 128 )
	if ( jeanne->GetDetected Player == 1 )
		Journal EB_Bone 50
		jeanne->ForceGreeting
		set greetonce to -1
	endif
	Activate
endif


End jeannechestScript
